quote.text: Peace is every step.
quote.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote.text: Smiling is very important. If we are not able to smile, then the world will not have peace. It is not by going out for a demonstration against nuclear missiles that we can bring about peace. It is with our capacity of smiling, breathing, and being peace that we can make peace.
quote.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote.text: If we are not peaceful, if we are not feeling well in our skin, we cannot demonstrate real peace, and we cannot raise our children well either.
quote.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote.text: In true dialogue, both sides are willing to change.
quote.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote.text: Be Yourself. Life is precious as it is. All the elements for your happiness are already here. There is no need to run, strive, search, or struggle. Just Be.
quote.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote.text: The practice of peace and reconciliation is one of the most vital and artistic of human actions.
quote.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote.text: Drink your tea slowly and reverently, as if it is the axis on which the world earth revolves - slowly, evenly, without rushing toward the future. Live the actual moment. Only this moment is life.
quote.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote.text: If we are peaceful, if we are happy, we can smile and blossom like a flower, and everyone in our family, our entire society, will benefit from our peace.
quote.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote.text: Every morning, when we wake up, we have twenty-four brand-new hours to live. What a precious gift! We have the capacity to live in a way that these twenty-four hours will bring peace, joy, and happiness to ourselves and others.
quote.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote.text: Harm no person, animal, plant or mineral.
quote.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote.text: The miracle is not to walk on water. The miracle is to walk on the green earth, dwelling deeply in the present moment and feeling truly alive.
quote.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote.text: Smile, breathe and go slowly.
quote.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote.text: If you don't have enough peace and understanding and loving-kindness within yourself, your actions will not truly be for peace.
quote.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote.text: And once we have the condition of peace and joy in us, we can afford to be in any situation. Even in the situation of hell, we will be able to contribute our peace and serenity. The most important thing is for each of us to have some freedom in our heart, some stability in our heart, some peace in our heart. Only then will we be able to relieve the suffering around us.
quote.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote.text: Our smile affirms our awareness and determination to live in peace and joy.
quote.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote.text: Peace is present right here and now, in ourselves and in everything we do and see. The question is whether or not we are in touch with it.
quote.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote.text: If in our daily life we can smile, if we can be peaceful and happy, not only we, but everyone will profit from it. This is the most basic kind of peace work.
quote.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote.text: I would not look upon anger as something foreign to me that I have to fight...I have to deal with my anger with care, with love, with tenderness, with nonviolence.
quote.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote.text: If you don't have enough peace and compassion within you, there is no way you can be happy.
quote.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote.text: Real peace is not in power, money, or weapons, but in deep inner peace.
quote.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote.text: Most of your suffering comes from the lack of understanding of yourself and others.
quote.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote.text: We have more possibilities available in each moment than we realize.
quote.author: Thich Nhat Hanh
